title: Passive Solar Design and Energy Efficiency in Timor-Leste Quiz

questions.question: What is the main goal of passive solar design?
choices: To use the sun's energy for heating and cooling
To completely eliminate the need for electricity
To generate solar power for export
To maximize the use of artificial lighting
questions.answer: To use the sun's energy for heating and cooling

questions.question: Energy efficiency refers to:
choices: Using less energy to achieve the same result
Relying solely on renewable energy sources
Maximizing energy consumption for better performance
questions.answer: Using less energy to achieve the same result

questions.question: Which of the following is a key consideration for site orientation in passive solar design?
choices: Positioning the building to maximize natural lighting and ventilation
Orienting the building to face the street
Placing the building in the shadiest part of the site
Aligning the building with neighboring structures
questions.answer: Positioning the building to maximize natural lighting and ventilation
